sections.heading: Sections, how construed.Sections 25-1062
sections.text: 01 and 25-1064 to 25-1064.02 shall in no way limit a person's right to an injunction or temporary restraining order if such remedies are specifically authorized by statute.SourceLaws 1986, LB 516, ยง 13.

sections.heading: 25-1062.01 and 25-1064 to 25-1064
sections.text: 02 shall in no way limit a person's right to an injunction or temporary restraining order if such remedies are specifically authorized by statute.
